Kiss your enemy

Chapter Notes

Although nothing happens... Luo Bing-ge POV as a warning.

See the end of the chapter for more notes

Although the storm has died down, dark clouds and icy air still cover Luo Bing-ge's palace. The demon had always been aware of the plots in his harem, but until that moment he had never given them much thought. However, he demanded that none of his spouses should get close to Shen Qingqiu. And after a chain of incidents, two of his main wives tried to attempt his life.

Both of them have been punished, especially Xiao Gongzhu. Sha Hualing is not only his second wife but also a powerful ally and one of his demon generals. Instead of love, they are united by a passion for violence. However, the demoness crossed the line and he has revoked some of her privileges.

After the last trial, the situation in the harem seems to have calmed down.

Although Luo Bing-ge doesn’t trust his wives, he hopes that they won’t repeat the mistake of toying with his patience. The only games the demon allows are those in which he can participate or entertain him, but not those that damage his property. Of course, Luo Bing-ge doesn't trust Shen Qingqiu either. Although his submission pleases him, the demon recognizes a different game than he is used to. Perhaps that Shen Qingqiu's heart is different, but there’s still a layer of pride covering his skin. And Luo Bing-ge must use all his techniques and tricks to gently tear it apart.

Fortunately, no matter how complicated his goal is, he always wins in the end.

The calm after the incident is allowing him to spend more time with his desired shizun. Although Shen Qingqiu always accepts his invitations, Luo Bing-ge is aware of the suspicion lurking in the depths of his eyes. His shizun is a wild and untamed beast. Although the demon has tied him to his side, it’s not enough. Luo Bing-ge yearns for more. With him, Shen Qingqiu always seems distant. It’s different from their past in Qing Jing Peak, colder and crueler, more like a breeze in his hands. Luo Bing-ge has savored the taste of a worried shizun and now he wants more.

That morning, Shen Qingqiu had agreed to go on a boat ride with him. Luo Bing-ge had buried his past under luxury and extravagance, yet he had intentionally chosen the smaller boat, forcing Shen Qingqiu to stand beside him. They are so close that it is impossible for their bodies to not rub against each other, and yet Luo Bing-ge feels that distance between them. He may be hugging Shen Qingqiu right now, but his shizun is silent and aloof, more interested in looking at the scenery than giving him any attention. Perhaps his former Shen Qingqiu hated him, but at least he didn't ignore him as if he is irrelevant.

Every time Luo Bing-ge leans into him, devouring his personal space, he can see how Shen Qingqiu tenses up. His shizun is being polite, but out of fear or respect, he is trying to hide his true emotions.

Possessing Shen Qingqiu is not enough.

Luo Bing-ge starts to play with his hair while Shen Qingqiu comments something about goldfish. His voice is as hollow as his expression. Luo Bing-ge could press him against the bottom of the ship and make him his right then and there, but then his shizun's cold facade would twist in rage. And Luo Bing-ge already tasted the hatred of one Shen Qingqiu. It was bitter and destructive, it left him scars that still burn years later. His hatred was more intense than the love of six hundred women and so Luo Bing-ge wonders what his affection will be like.

Will it be enough to complete that emptiness that he feels in his chest and that neither violence nor destruction can fill? Or will his interest vanish once he reaches his goal? After all, even the funniest games get tedious once he wins.

Luo Bing-ge lets go of his hair to grab hold of his jaw, turning his face towards him. Fear shines in his dilated pupils, in the fists that crumple the sleeves, or the pressure of his lips tightening. The demon leans in intending to kiss him, but in the end, his lips stop at his cheek without daring to go any further. Thanks to that closeness, Luo Bing-ge appreciates his rapid heartbeat and ragged breathing. It’s not the excitement he's used to, but panic.

"Relax, shizun." He whispers in his ear as he brushes his hair back from his face. "This Lord is patient."

But patience wears out as hunger grows. And they both know it.

Shen Qingqiu takes a deep breath. Luo Bing-ge appreciates the effort he is making to get used to his presence. So adorable , he thinks before hugging him, so Shen Qingqiu ends up resting on his chest and he can amuse himself by playing with his hair. At times, his hand moves from the nape of his neck to slide down his spine, although without reaching his waist. Yet.

"This Lord wonders... Will Shizun love me one day?" He chuckles, noticing his stiffness. "Shizun doesn't need to pretend anymore. I know you still don't love me."

Shen Qingqiu puts his hands on his shoulders and tries to move, but Luo Bing-ge prevents him from releasing. Resigned, Shen Qingqiu can only raise his head to meet his eyes. At least his shizun doesn't seem distant anymore and he regards him suspiciously.

"Do I have another option?"

"No." Luo Bing-ge acknowledges before placing a kiss on his forehead.

Luo Bing-ge has been a harem lord for many years. Few tricks will surprise him. And because of that, he suspects that Shen Qingqiu's passivity will be broken soon. It's a pretty obvious certainty: if displays of affection make Shen Qingqiu uncomfortable, he'll try to run away from his obligations after marriage. Something that Luo Bing-ge will prevent.

His patience is not eternal, although as long as Shen Qingqiu is fun he can grant him certain exemptions.

"This Lord wonders..." Luo Bing-ge comments. With one arm still imprisoning Shen Qingqiu against him, he moves his other hand to hold his chin. His thumb brushes his pursed lips. "What plans does Shizun have for our wedding?"

His discomfort is immense, but Shen Qingqiu can't run away or escape his gaze with silly excuses. Still, his cracked facade remains. After all, he is a cultivator who was able to withstand the most inhuman torture while an eternity. He can resist anything, right? Luo Bing-ge thinks, narrowing his eyes. Perhaps he should satiate his appetite with the other, already broken. Accustomed to breaking up his enemies and lovers, Luo Bing-ge is on the verge of giving in to his impulses and waiting. And that fight flutters in his stomach.

Shen Qingqiu's silence is a clear answer.

Luo Bing-ge finally frees him. His relief is quite apparent despite his efforts to pretend otherwise.

"Let's play a game, will you, shizun? This Lord promises to be as good as shizun's behavior."

If Shen Qingqiu strives to love him, then Luo Bing-ge will also strive to control himself. But if Shen Qingqiu decides to betray his trust and fight, so... Luo Bing-ge smiles, showing his teeth, as he thinks of all he can do. But most of his ideas are unsatisfying, as they will end with a short reward and not the tasty goal he is after.

Perhaps he should speed up Liu Qingge's kidnapping. Or of his former dead brother. If in the end, Shen Qingqiu decides to give up, perhaps with the necessary encouragement he will learn to fake it.

 

 

There is an idea that haunts Shen Yuan and he cannot forget. It's a desperate prospect that makes him wonder what's more important: Shen Jiu's life or decency. After another unsuccessful day, in which the three of them return to dinner at the bamboo house together, Shen Yuan makes a decision.

Placing his cup of tea on the table, he clears his throat and takes a deep breath as he tries to ignore the tingling of nerves inside his stomach.

"This master thinks he has found a solution..." The other two's attention immediately turns to him. Shen Yuan feels guilty for getting his hopes up with an unlikely chance. Uncomfortable, he clears his throat again. "It's about Xin Mo, Luo Binghe."

Liu Qingge frowns as he listens to him.

"Haven't we decided that the demon would never use that sword again?"

I know, Liu-shidi! It's not my fault that all the problems in PIDW were solved with Xin Mo in exchange for papapa! Shen Yuan hides behind the fan so his expression won't betray him.

"I’m aware of that. For that very reason, this master will tell you what we know first, and we will all make a decision..."

"There's no need." Luo Binghe announces with determination and a hand already on his waist, where he carries his two swords. "This disciple will do anything to rescue shizun."

Liu Qingge looks at the two of them without softening his misgivings before turning to Shen Yuan.

"Explain yourself."

"Xin Mo is one of the most powerful artifacts in the entire world. It is possible that, despite the other Luo Bing-ge's protections, with the necessary encouragement it could affect the cracks we have already located."

"What do you mean encouragement ? Sacrifices?"

"Something like that..." He murmurs behind the fan.

"No."

Liu Qingge crosses his arms and Luo Binghe stands up, furious.

"So, it looks like Liu-shishu is a hypocrite who doesn't care about shizun..."

Instantly, the cultivator also stood up to meet his eyes.

"Of course, I care about him." He growls through clenched teeth. "But we can't sacrifice anyone else..."

"Not that kind of sacrifice, Liu-shidi." Shen Yuan intervenes before the two try to fight and break their house again. "There is no death or blood involved. However, manipulating Xin Mo means that Xin Mo will be able to manipulate you, Luo Binghe. It is dangerous and you must know all the consequences."

"This disciple could..."

"Stop bragging, you arrogant brat." Liu Qingge interrupts him. "Have you already forgotten your previous qi deviations?" The truth is harsh and cruel. Luo Binghe bows his head without hiding his frustration against his own weakness. "Stop avoiding us, Shen Yuan. What kind of sacrifice?"

Shen Yuan is about to die of embarrassment, but years of pretending to be Shen Qingqiu has taught him to maintain a deadpan facade. Stop looking at me like that, Liu-shishu!

"Dual cultivation."

The other two freeze for a moment. Then they both blush. Luo Binghe opens his mouth without saying anything, looking at Shen Yuan, while Liu Qingge takes a step back.

“Are you insinuating… No way, Shen Yuan!”

"Luo Binghe doesn't have two interests? Of course, this master would talk to the people involved and inform them of the risks..."

"Shen Yuan, forget it! Now!"

Shen Yuan doesn't understand Liu Qingge's overreaction. Annoyed, he snaps the fan shut to look his friend into the eyes. Unfortunately, in a world where only the main character is allowed a fulfilling sex life, it is understandable that others are prudish. However, his brother's physical integrity is at stake and Shen Yuan cannot wait any longer.

"Can you let me finish talking? This master has already weighed in on all that that implies. Maybe it doesn't even work! Xin Mo feeds on dual cultivation and we're not interested in giving it too much power either, but what about a kiss? That way we would check my theory and how much it would take to open the way to the other world without complete dual cultivation."

He never imagined that Liu Qingge was so puritanical to blush so intensely at the prospect of a simple kiss. Though he's not surprised either, given his obsession with Shen Qingqiu's visits to brothels. Shen Yuan looks at Luo Binghe, the other one involved. The surprise over, his eyes are starting to sparkle with interest. Shen Yuan sighs. Although the book is now a real adventure, it is impossible to escape the impending romance.

"So, Luo Binghe, what do you think?"

"It's a good idea, shizun, but..." Hearing him, Liu Qingge tenses up and glances at him sideways. "We shouldn't involve anyone else."

Shen Yuan tilts his head in confusion. He was sure that the protagonist would take an opportunity to make merit in front of his romantic interests. But even though there are two people in his heart, he is showing his maturity by putting Shen Jiu's rescue first. What a filial disciple!

"So you're suggesting kissing one of us out of scientific interests?"

Luo Binghe smirks with narrowed eyes.

"Indeed."

Why is it suddenly so hot in the room? It must be Liu Qingge’s rage, who is silently glaring at Luo Binghe. The cultivator has his hand on Cheng Luan's hilt and grits his teeth but is unable to find an argument against it. Although Shen Yuan has never been interested in men, he may be able to make an exception. Saving his brother is more important than a first kiss. Besides, curiosity tingles under his skin, around his fingers and chest.

"Just a kiss then." Shen Yuan speaks without noticing that he is fiddling with the fan. "Immediately after, Luo Binghe, you must tell us what changes you notice in the sword. Understood?"

"Of course, shizun."

Liu Qingge looks at the two of them. First to Shen Yuan, who is shivering with nervousness and he doesn't know if the prospect of kissing Luo Binghe makes him uncomfortable or not. Then to Luo Binghe, who is closing in on his shizun. And after a brief interval of hesitation, the cultivator releases his grip on his sword and grabs Luo Binghe by the collar of his clothes.

Shen Yuan drops his fan when the two hottest men in the world kiss.

There is nothing romantic about the kiss, it is more of a fight. Although Luo Binghe's eyes widen in surprise, he immediately narrows them before attacking the cultivator. Well, Shen Yuan doesn't care if they decide to release all of his energy and rage in a duel for kiss supremacy. The way they try to trap each other is so violent that Luo Binghe ends up pinning Liu Qingge against the wall.

"Please don't break anything..."

Liu Qingge punches him to push him away, but Luo Binghe grabs his wrists and presses him hard against the wall. It’s quite rude, but Shen Yuan can't stop looking. There's something… strangely erotic about seeing the two of them kiss and he doesn't get it why. More heated, he begins to fan himself.

"This master thinks this is enough..."

Liu Qingge bends his knees and kicks Luo Binghe in the stomach. When Shen Yuan already believed that the kiss was over with the War God's release, he reverses the roles.

"You know what? This master has changed his mind. It’s still not enough. More passion."

Luo Binghe's insolence doesn't die despite being the one cornered against the wall, as he raises his hand to grab Liu Qingge's ass. A great ass that Shen Yuan is looking at with envy. He obviously doesn't want to touch his shidi's ass! Of course not! Unless…

"Stop biting. I see you. This master said no blood."

It would be a disaster if Liu Qingge ingested the demon blood just because they are two wild beasts.

They keep fighting for more minutes. After knocking over a bookcase and almost ending up on the table, breaking several teacups, Shen Yuan sighs in resignation and stops giving them any further instructions. Of course, he doesn’t stop looking at the show. Is it necessary to break clothes? Why are they dragging it out so long despite their enmity? It is clear that for Luo Binghe it is just a scientific experiment (perhaps also a test) and that his filial spirit is just thinking of rescuing Shen Jiu. It's so adorable how he selflessly gives it all in one kiss. However, Liu Qingge...

Shen Yuan frowns and for the first time he wonders if Liu Qingge is gay.

Such a beautiful man is also destined to fall into the hands of the protagonist, right?

 

 

Luo Binghe doesn’t think about what he is doing. His instinct tells him to defeat Liu Qingge using any strategy. However, Shen Yuan's interest is unexpected and it fuels his fire. So he goes out of his way to punish his shishu for stealing the kiss he longed for.

They could stop at any moment, however, Luo Binghe only breaks the kiss upon noticing a disturbance with Xin Mo.

On the other side, someone is leading the way between worlds.

Chapter End Notes

This is Shen Yuan's gay awakening... first part.

In the next chapter at least one character will cross over to the other world (finally!!!!!!). Will it be the rescue team or Luo Bing-ge? 👀 See you next week!

★ Twitter

✰ Tumblr

Shen Yuan contemplates the scum villain’s fate

Chapter Notes

See the end of the chapter for notes

There is something ironic about the determination with which Shen Yuan crosses over to the other side. Despite the overprotective attitude of the other two, he is the first to walk through the portal that Luo Binghe created the moment he noticed a fluctuation in the wall between worlds. Despite all his efforts to avoid the original book, Shen Yuan no longer trembles at the prospect of facing Luo Bing-ge. And this time, it has been his own decision and not being forced by the System.

Liu Qingge and Luo Binghe follow him without hesitation. And the three arrive at a huge palace, more immense than some cities. It is a palace that aspires to outshine heaven and command respect tangled with terror. Holding on to his memories of the book, Shen Yuan guides his friends. His intention is, first, to hide so no gossipy servant will spread a rumor that the Demon Emperor is acting weird with two strangers. Second, locate where they are. And once he recognizes the place from Airplane's elaborate descriptions, Shen Yuan begins to walk. Fortunately, Shang Qinghua described Luo Bing-ge's palace in great detail in this section of the book: erotic scenes of the demon with his harem and scenes of bloody torture. Right now the data of the best places to fuck is not important, but finding the prison in which he locked Shen Qingqiu. And how to get to the cell.

At all that time, his stomach is crushed by the pressure. If it wasn't for the adrenaline coursing through his veins, Shen Yuan would have vomited by now. Besides that, he would be unable to continue forward, but he would try to run away in the opposite direction.

He is startled when someone grabs his hand. But it’s just Liu Qingge. After turning around, Shen Yuan meets his worried gaze. The touch of their intertwined fingers is warm and comforting.

"Are you okay?"

Shen Yuan nods, hiding all of his discomfort behind an ambiguous smile.

"Let's go on. This place is terrifying."

On his other side, Luo Binghe doesn't say anything. The demon gazes at the palace and the walls with a frown and dark eyes.

Despite the urge to run to the prison, Shen Yuan forces himself to be cautious. The three of them slip away cautiously through the shadows and the untrodden paths, always avoiding the voices and the guards. His heart begins to pound as he recognizes the prison building. The anticipation he once felt reading those chapters has turned to panic. Luo Bing-ge took years to turn Shen Qingqiu into a human stick, but a demon who has already tasted blood will not hesitate to torture so much. Terror slows Shen Yuan's steps. He feels a lump in his throat and pressure in his chest. Breathing hurts, so he catches his breath.

Thanks to the descriptions in the book, Shen Yuan and his companions sneak into the prison. He even knows what the cell is. If Liu Qingge or Luo Binghe considers it suspicious, neither says anything. And the three move towards the inevitable in fearful silence.

Once in front of the cell, Shen Yuan stops. The air stinks of blood, suffering, and putrefaction. His throat is dry. Recognizing his indecisiveness, Luo Binghe puts his arm around his shoulders in a comforting hug and rests his hand on the door. His demonic qi rips it to shreds.

The cell is cold and dark as a tomb.

Inside is a woman with braids dressed in green and a dismembered man.

Shen Yuan begins to hyperventilate. He enjoyed reading the cruel and gory scenes of torture, but there is a difference between the book and reality. Especially when Shen Qingqiu is no longer just his least favorite character, but his new brother. It hurts. Nausea climbs up his throat. Shen Yuan is barely aware that Luo Binghe is paralyzed and pale or that Liu Qingge has drawn his sword and rage shines in his eyes.

Ahead of them, the woman, a more adult and less smiling version of Ning Yingying, looks at them in confusion.

"Husband? Shizun? What are you doing here?"

Shen Yuan clumsily raises a hand and rests it on the forearm of Liu Qingge, who seems ready to commit murder.

"It's not Jiu-ge." Shen Yuan understands. The relief is brief since he no longer knows where he will find his brother in that insane world. "He is the other. He is the Shen Qingqiu of this world."

Ning Yingying takes a step back. She still looks at Luo Binghe, but her expression immediately becomes horrified.

"You are not them... You are from shizun’s world."

Liu Qingge lunges at her. With a swift blow, he pushes her to the ground, and the sword points at her neck.

"Who has done this?" He sputters. "What are you doing here?"

Ning Yingying trembles, unable to speak. Despite the horror of approaching the mutilated body of the original Shen Qingqiu, Shen Yuan runs towards them and grabs Liu Qingge by the wrist.

"She would never hurt her shizun."

"You do not know her!"

"I have also been her master. I know my disciple."

Despite having teary eyes, Ning Yingying dares to speak. Her voice is weak as the murmur of a little bird.

"Have you come to rescue shizun?"

Luo Binghe walks towards them. His footsteps startle Ning Yingying, who cringes a little more.

"Where is my shizun?"

"He is staying at the Orchid Palace."

Shen Yuan frowns. This is the place where the newly arrived concubines stayed until they received their own rooms. It is a fact that he remembers perfectly and a blatant lie. Ning Yingying is a terrible liar.

"Ning Yingying, I have come for my brother." He speaks in a conciliatory voice to gain her trust. Although Ning Yingying never played into the machinations of others, after the war she was never the same. "I'm not going to leave him here to end up like... like him."

Shen Yuan is trying to ignore the fact that this Shen Qingqiu is still alive and is probably listening to them. Or maybe he's asleep. His breathing is so light that it seems like an illusion.

Ning Yingying looks at him in confusion.

"I already told you. Shizun is in the Orchid Palace until the wedding."

"But Luo Bing-ge never..."

Liu Qingge is hissing and Luo Binghe's expression has darkened. Before Shen Yuan finished speaking, the War God pointed his sword at the demon.

"If that monster has touched him, I swear I will kill him first and then you."

"Oh, Liu-shishu, I'll let you kill him once I castrate him."

Eh? Shen Yuan blinks in confusion. For some reason, they do believe in his disciple. And, most terrifying, a sixth sense warns him that she doesn't seem to be lying. But that's strange revenge. Twisted. Humiliating. But not the kind of revenge that suits Luo Bing-ge, more fond of cruelly killing his enemies.

The two rivals exchange a look. Liu Qingge lowers his sword and heads towards Shen Qingqiu. Meanwhile, Luo Binghe kneels in front of Ning Yingying.

"We need your help to rescue shizun. Could you tell us where the Orchid Palace is?"

With a straight blow, Liu Qingge releases his rage in severing Shen Qingqiu's chains and then gently holds him down.

"Shen Yuan." He calls out to him. "Help me."

Despite disgust churning his stomach and his doubts, Shen Yuan walks towards them as he thinks about Shang Qinghua's words. Perhaps no Shen Qingqiu is a good person. But even if this is not his brother, he is someone who never deserved such cruel torture. Justice is faster than that inhuman agony. And this time, he cannot excuse Luo Bing-ge, who has committed many atrocities and kidnapped Shen Jiu. Despite the disgust that twists his guts, Shen Yuan stops in front of them and looks at the gaunt pallor of the real Shen Qingqiu. He is so thin that his ribs stand out under his skin and there is hardly any difference between his healthy eye and his hollow, both covered with dried blood. He looks like someone different from his brother, even though Shen Yuan knows that they are both the same person.

Shen Yuan wonders if Liu Qingge will be able to offer him the painless death that Shen Qingqiu deserves.

And if he will be able to bear it.

However, Liu Qingge passes the body to him. It’s as light as holding a bag of bones. Luo Binghe gets up. With a flick of the wrist, he creates a portal out of nothing.

Shen Yuan understands his intentions too late when he is pushed to the other side. And he lands in Cang Qiong Mountain Sect with the Shen Qingqiu that he never expected to rescue. Right away he recognizes the smell of medicinal plants. They are on Qian Cao Peak, but even that scent and the bright sun cannot erase the cold and unpleasant memory of the prison.

 

 

Luo Binghe doesn't dodge Liu Qingge's punch. Now that Shen Yuan is safe with the Shen Qingqiu of this world, neither of them mind pretending anymore. A second punch hits him on the cheekbone. The third does not arrive. Liu Qingge gasps in front of him, furious like a wounded animal.

"That's your fucking fault." He hisses.

"I know."

"No, you don't!" Although Liu Qingge screams, he clings to his willpower to sheath the sword instead of fighting anymore. "Your selfishness and arrogance allowed this monster to kidnap him. But he is doing the same as you!"

That fuels Luo Binghe's rage, who clenches his fists.

"I never...!"

"Never what!? Would you kidnap Shen Jiu against his will? Force him to give him your blood? Lock him up in a fancy palace? You did!"

"You've already reproached me!"

"But you still have no regrets!" Liu Qingge points out the place where the other Shen Qingqiu was. "He could have done the same to him! Your other self is a monster." Liu Qingge takes a deep breath as he drops his arm. And he gives him one last look of contempt. "You can be him. Never forget it."

But Liu Qingge is wrong.

Luo Binghe regrets it. When they find Shen Jiu, he will apologize. His gaze stops at the bloodstains. They are huge puddles that cover almost the entire ground. Despite the fleeting glimpse, he is well aware of the other Shen Qingqiu's status. The mutilations. The scars. That horror is etched into his retinas, and nausea shakes his stomach. As they walked inside the walls, Luo Binghe was aware of being in a twisted version of his dreams. But he never wished to harm any shizun, only to understand their abandonment and why he was pushed into the Endless Abyss. The cruelty of this Shen Qingqiu's injuries makes him shiver.

He will try to help Shen Qingqiu. It’s a promise. Although his other self broke him, he has the power to heal him. Perhaps they share obsessions, but they are not meant to be the same person as long as they make different decisions.

Luo Binghe regrets it and that is another difference between them.

Chapter End Notes

When I was planning this fic, I ran into a problem: what do I do with the original Shen Qingqiu? I can't leave him with Bing-ge! After all he's been through, he deserves a break too! So... now they found a new brother! ☺️❤️❤️

In addition to rambling a bit, chapter 45 was important for Shen Yuan to not judge the original Shen Qingqiu in this chapter, allowing him to have his happy ending as well.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

★ Twitter

✰ Tumblr

Finally someone comes back for Shen Jiu

Chapter Notes

Author: Today it's a wonderful afternoon to write a chapter quietly :)
Toilet: *breaks*
Author: :')

See the end of the chapter for more notes

When Luo Binghe arrived at this world, he was overwhelmed after feeling his blood spread inside so many people. Perhaps with a little practice, he would be able to pick Shen Jiu out of so many vague signals, but they are running out of time, so he heads towards Ning Yingying. She is also marked by his blood. It's strange, almost unimaginable. Despite the fact that for others the two of them are the same person, Luo Binghe doesn’t have a hard time separating himself from his other self thanks to those kinds of decisions.

He would never offer his blood indiscriminately, though something inside him, perhaps the echo of the boy he once was, wonders what it would be like to have so many bonds. Luo Bing-ge is not only more cunning and powerful, but his palace is also bigger, his dreams more ambitious. He also seems better accompanied.

Luo Binghe begins to understand that apart from his two shizuns, he doesn't have anyone else. His friendship with Ning Yingying or Liu Mingyan was broken when he fell into the Endless Abyss. He has no more friends or trusted people. His relationship with the demons is marked by respect and his heart pursues two people who may never reciprocate him.

This is not the time to be distracted or think of such nonsense when Shen Jiu is in danger, but his heart sinks under the weight of loneliness.

This Ning Yingying is unable to deny anything to Luo Binghe, even when her fear is evident. She rubs her hands together nervously, her gaze still lost in the space where the portal Shen Yuan and Shen Qingqiu returned through was. With a sigh, she shakes her head and begins to smooth the wrinkles out of her clothes.

"I can guide you to the Orchid Palace." She murmurs in a cautious voice, looking at the two of them. "This humble wife often visits shizun. No one will suspect a thing. And my lord can accompany me..."

That nickname makes him cringe.

"Luo Binghe." He interrupts her. "Just Luo Binghe. Don't call me that."

A flash of panic flashes across her eyes and she quickly ducks her head.

"This humble wife is so sorry..."

Luo Binghe wants to interrupt her again and tell her that she is not her wife, neither is she in another world nor will she ever be, but he is afraid that it will scare her even more. Liu Qingge, who is looking at the two of them with his arms crossed, seems to have understood the problem as well. He snorts before intervening.

"What you are trying to imply is that Luo Binghe can pose as your husband?"

"Exactly!" Ning Yingying finally raises her head. "They are identical! And no one will stop or dare to question our lord! Besides, my husband visits shizun quite often. We can walk to the Orchid Palace and enter without raising any suspicions."

Liu Qingge frowns. Although Ning Yingying still hasn't mentioned anything about a certain complication, both of them are aware of the problem.

"What about me? Should I wait for you here? No way! This bastard is capable of abandoning me here and running off with Shen Jiu."

Luo Binghe doesn’t defend himself. Honestly, it's a tempting idea. After all, the most sensible thing is to open the portal once they find Shen Jiu and disappear from this hell. The longer they are here and the more they are seen, the more likely they are to attract the other Luo Bing-ge's attention.

Ning Yingying bows her head apologetically in a gesture so submissive that even Liu Qingge seems to regret his harsh words.

"This stupid wife apologizes. I didn't mean to offend Liu-shishu nor did I plan to imply Liu-shishu staying here."

"It's okay." He growls as he looks away, uncomfortable. "What's your idea?"

"If you'll let me, this wife can go get you a costume."

Luo Binghe narrows his eyes. Even he doesn't know how far his trust goes for that Ning Yingying, as harmless as terrified. However, it is an interesting idea.

"What kind of costume?" The demon intervenes.

"Wel... Liu-shishu looks a lot like his sister."

"My sister?" He stammers. "What does Mingyan have to do with this?"

Liu Qingge is pale and his eyes wide in confusion. Although his intelligence is limited, everyone is aware of the other Luo Bing-ge's appetites. Luo Binghe laughs without hiding his malice. His smile is mocking as he gazes at his rival, who clenches his fists before glaring at him.

"That's an excellent idea, Ning-shijie." The demon purrs, savoring his impending humiliation. "Liu Mingyan always wears a veil. With his hidden features, it will be easy to confuse them." He steps forward. Despite the tension, Liu Qingge does not back down. "And Liu-shishu's figure is just as slender, graceful... and delicate."

"I'm going to kill you, beast. Slowly." He hisses through clenched teeth.

"Oh!" Luo Binghe pretends to be offended. "Shizun will be angry when he finds out we couldn't rescue him because someone can't work as a team."

"You!"

The demon turns its back, ignoring him, to look at Ning Yingying.

"Go get that costume." For the moment, he decides to trust her.

No, Ning Yingying can’t be a bad person and there is something special about someone who still visits Shen Qingqiu despite his horrible state. She bows respectfully before running for the exit.

Furious, Liu Qingge punches him in the ribs.

"Don't make decisions without my opinion!" He growls. "Maybe she's gone to rat us out!"

"She will not."

"How do you know?"

"Because she fears Luo Binghe." The demon smiles bitterly. "And in her eyes, I am Luo Binghe."

Liu Qingge snorts without softening his suspicion. Luo Binghe doesn't trust him either but trusts his abilities and his loyalty to Shen Jiu, so for once he is willing to work with his rival. Or at least try.

"Shizun is in danger. And I will do anything to rescue him. What about you, Liu-shishu?" His gaze grows colder and his smile disappears. "Would you try to control your temper for once?"

"I'm not the one who is at risk of a qi deviation..."

"But Liu-shishu has also had qi deviations in the past, am I wrong?" He cuts him off. "And your first reaction upon arriving here was to attack a possible ally. Shizun doesn't need your rage but your collaboration. So, are you going to work with me to rescue him, or do I have to subdue you first? If it's a fight you want, you'll have it." Despite the confidence in his voice, Luo Binghe is aware of that desire for blood and violence buried deep in his chest. He has overused Xin Mo to open two portals and the wishes of the sword have been rekindled. "We can fight. But later. When we're home. Until now, would you be my fake wife?"

Liu Qingge is flushed with fury, but he turns away while clicking his tongue.

"Fine."

His growl is almost inaudible and Luo Binghe wishes to mock him, but it is an unheard fact that the proud War God has relented and for Shen Jiu's sake, he won’t be the one to boycott this mission.

But he will remind Liu Qingge in the future, of course. This will be an unforgettable memory.

Despite Liu Qingge's misgivings, Ning Yingying returns with a bunch of clothes. He offers Luo Binghe other outer robes that the real Demon Lord had forgotten in her rooms. Although they both wear the same colors, Luo Binghe immediately appreciates the difference in quality. The fabric of these outer robes is heavier and more expensive. Despite the distaste of wearing something that belongs to his other self, Luo Binghe doesn't hesitate to take off his and dress in them. It's like putting on another person's skin. And he fears that it will make him a little more like Luo Bing-ge.

Even though those outer robes are stylish and make him feel like an emperor, he wants to rip them off.

At the other end of the cell, Ning Yingying is helping Liu Qingge dress up. She hasn’t just brought a white dress, but she has also let down his hair and is combing it.

"The dress belongs to this wife." She explains as she braids his hair. "This wife has not dared to enter Liu Mingyan's rooms, but I know her style."

Luo Binghe walks towards them with curious steps. Although Ning Yingying has chosen a loose dress that covers Liu Qingge's muscular arms, it is easy for him to recognize him. However, the different hairstyle and veil blur his features. Unfortunately, his gaze is too fierce. Liu Qingge glares at Luo Binghe when he playfully approaches.

"Liu-shishu is very pretty, great job Ning-shijie." He comments. "But, Liu-shishu, your eyes are too terrifying. You won't fool anyone."

"Oh, Liu Mingyan is like that too." Ning Yingying intervenes.

Luo Binghe's smile freezes. In his memories, Liu Mingyan is a mischievous young woman, calm and without her brother's aggressiveness. 

Everything is wrong in this world.

Ning Yingying also applies makeup to Liu Qingge and then helps Luo Binghe with his hair to imitate the Demon Lord's hairstyle. Once they are ready, the three of them leave the cell. Luo Binghe breathes the clean air outside. The stink of blood and rotten flesh is still inside his lungs and he fears he will never forget it.

Although they are in a private area where there are few servants and guards, as Ning Yingying explains to them, she hugs her left arm. Walking like that is uncomfortable. Luo Binghe pretends that she is Shen Yuan. If he doesn't look directly at her, he may be fooled by her green clothes into imagining that she is someone else. That helps him relax and gain confidence with every step. However, Liu Qingge makes no effort to act. He walks beside them with impatient steps. And although Liu Mingyan is also a warrior, Luo Binghe suspects that she would never move with such inelegant brusqueness.

As they approach more crowded areas, Luo Binghe sighs before reaching out with his other arm and grabbing Liu Qingge around the waist.

"Just relax." He hisses at him despite his fake smile. "Only for half an hour."

"Don’t touch me."

Luo Binghe doesn't stop him from getting rid of him, however, Ning Yingying still scolds them in a fearful voice.

"Please, Liu-shishu. Liu Mingyan doesn't act like that."

"My sister is a warrior, not the complement of a demon."

"This humble wife doesn't mean to offend Liu-shishu, but you seem to want to kill someone. You are too angry."

"Because I am!"

"Me too." Luo Binghe growls, annoyed at his terrible cooperation. "And I don't have the help of a veil. Just pretend… Imagine that you have disguised yourself to meet Shizun on a secret date."

"Why would I disguise myself to meet Shen Jiu?" He frowns even deeper. "Besides, you would ruin any date."

"In which I have not been invited? Indeed."

"My husband... Liu-shishu... Please..."

Liu Qingge hisses in anger before walking closer to his side. And slowly, with tense movements, he grabs Luo Binghe's left arm. Despite his vivid imagination, the demon is unable to ignore the fact that Liu Qingge is hugging him. Or rather, squeezing his arm hard enough to break a bone.

"Don't be so hard, Liu-shishu." He leans down to whisper in his ear. "You look like a neglected wife."

Now Liu Qingge is digging his nails into him.

"Stop talking."

Luo Binghe's smile grows like that of a hungry wolf. It's strange. Ning Yingying's closeness makes him uncomfortable, but Liu Qingge's is funny.

They keep walking. But as Ning Yingying has already warned them, soon on their way they come across guards, servants, court members, and other women whom Luo Binghe identifies as more wives. Ambitious bastard , he hisses as he thinks of his other self. No one pays attention to Ning Yingying, who walks beside the demon as naturally as usual, and no one dares to look into Luo Binghe's eyes. Humans and demons bow and greet him with respectful voices. But some gazes, especially those in the harem, linger longer than necessary on Liu Qingge.

And Luo Binghe can hear their gossip.

"Isn't Liu Mingyan a little weird today?"

"Is she angry that our husband prefers Shen Qingqiu?"

"Perhaps they have discussed..."

"I don't know... Something seems off."

Luo Binghe clicks his tongue. At the same time, he notices the cultivator's stiffness. Obviously, his senses are as sharp as his and he has heard them too.

"Relax, Liu-shishu."

"I'm trying." He hisses, clutching him tighter. His fingernails are starting to tear the fabric of the sleeve.

"Try better."

"Fuck you."

"I think that's what the others expect." Although teasing Liu Qingge is fun, it's a dangerous game when the real Demon Lord can appear at any moment. "Let's try something different. Let go of both of you."

Liu Qingge doesn’t hesitate to follow his instructions this time. Ning Yingying doesn't either, though she's still shivering and nervously rubbing her hands together. Luo Binghe puts an arm around Liu Qingge's waist and pulls him close so that now others won't be able to see his face so easily. His furious look is just for him.

"Let's continue, Ning-shijie."

Luo Binghe hears Liu Qingge growl. It sounds like the roar of a wild animal, but at least he has assumed his lack of acting skills and reluctantly agrees to hide in Luo Binghe with a hug. Now the demon's hand rests on his back as Liu Qingge clings to him. Next to them, Ning Yingying shows them that it is possible to walk normally without arousing suspicion despite not hugging him.

And so, step by step, they made their way to the Orchid Palace.

 

 

Shen Jiu tries to enjoy a quiet moment when the door to the room bursts open. Who will it be now? He thinks, annoyed, as he sits up. His mood sours as he recognizes the dark figure of Luo Bing-ge, accompanied by two of his wives. Still, Shen Jiu hides all of his emotions behind a merely curious facade.

"Shizun!" Ning Yingying screams and cries as she rushes towards him with an abruptness too disrespectful for a lady of her current prestige.

The hug is a collision that makes him stumble. Shen Jiu holds her by the shoulders since he has a feeling that her former disciple is about to collapse.

"What's wrong?"

Raising his head, his gaze met Luo Binghe's. The demon has tears in his eyes. Although Shen Jiu opens his mouth, all of his words sink in confusion. And next to the demon...

His heart races.

A long time ago, Shen Jiu was abandoned in hell behind the walls of a beautiful mansion. He waited for Qi-Ge, but Qi-Ge rebuilt his miserable life, forgetting about him in exchange for a promising future. He waited and waited. He waited until they shattered him into pieces so sharp that they destroyed all the monsters. He survived incompletely. He found Qi-Ge. His heart darkened even more. He was unhappy but his dreams began to come true. He managed to enter Cang Qiong Peak. His life continued to be unhappy. He rose to Peak Lord. Everyone despised him. He despised everyone. He got used to Shen Qingqiu's name and unhappiness.

He found a brother.

His brother disappeared and he waited while all the unseen wounds he had collected ate at him in silent sickness.

Shen Jiu had grown tired of waiting. In the end, he had learned the lesson: his life wasn’t valuable. No one would come back for him, so he should stop waiting and fight before it was too late. He was no longer a helpless child or a slave. He had power and weapons, he had the determination to face a demon and win with his wits alone.

Although he wasn’t waiting for anyone anymore, still, his eyes fill with tears. Furious, he covers his face with both hands.

"Shen Jiu?" A voice mutters cautiously.

"Shizun, I... I'm so sorry... It was this disciple's fault… Is… Is shizun okay?"

Shen Jiu hears footsteps approaching him. They are real. Despite being in another world, they have defied the impossible to search for him. He is not alone. He never was, even though Shen Yuan had disappeared. His world is not locked inside his bamboo house. It's bigger than his pessimistically blinded mind believed. Shen Jiu can't say anything as a sob strangles his throat.

His body moves instinctively. And Shen Jiu walks away from Ning Yingying to hug Luo Binghe and Liu Qingge awkwardly, clutching at his clothes and crying as something inside him snaps, breaking free. It is a weight that disappears. It hurts like a wound healing.

They are also hugging him as if that dirty slave is the most precious thing in the universe.

After many years, someone has come back for him.

Chapter End Notes

And with the end of this arc, we also close the subplot of Shen Jiu's traumas!

Although they're not completely healed, he already has the tools to overcome his trauma. For me, the most important thing about this latest kidnapping was not that Shen Jiu needed to be rescued, but that he made the decision to rescue himself. And all of them have managed to come thanks to his intrigues. The appearance of Liu Qingge and Luo Binghe is important for his mental stability. This scene is the last piece for him to accept that he is loved by others and not someone's replacement.(Shen Jiu is almost ready for the romantic plot, Shen Yuan you are next!)

The next chapter will be the last of the third part and finally the brothers will meet ❤️❤️

 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

★ Twitter

✰ Tumblr

The brothers meet again「 END THIRD PART 」

Chapter Notes

See the end of the chapter for notes

Liu Qingge watches as Shen Jiu slowly collects himself, breaking the embrace as he retrieves the broken shards of his control. He takes a deep breath before wiping the tears away with his sleeve. Despite his delicate movements, Shen Jiu still trembles. Liu Qingge wants to hold his hand and promise him that he is safe, but in the end, he keeps quiet.

For a few seconds, no one says anything. Then, silence breaks out as Shen Qingqiu slaps Luo Binghe.

Although the demon could have dodged it, he accepts the blow like all of Liu Qingge's. Luo Binghe lowers his head and his dark curls cover his expression.

"Shizun, I'm sorry..."

Another slap.

"Stop apologizing." Shen Jiu hisses, lowering his arm. "If you're really sorry, prove it and get us out of here..."

They all are startled when the door opens.

"I was quite curious when I heard that my husband was heading to the Orchid Palace with Ning Yingying and… Well, me." Liu Mingyan walks into the rooms in an icy rage. In this world, his sister is much more serious and there is no light in her eyes. Not even her veil is enough to hide her gloomy expression. This Liu Mingyan has been sharpened and hate echoes in every step. "My lord, I'm afraid that another shapeshifting demoness is trying to trick you... Or maybe an enemy spy?" She draws Shui Se. "There is only one way to confirm it."

Then her gaze meets Liu Qingge's and her eyes widen.

"Ge?..." She murmurs in a voice torn by pain.

Her pulse trembles and so does her sword. Liu Mingyan's gaze shifts from him to Luo Binghe and then to Shen Jiu, who moves to stand next to Liu Qingge.

"Do you believe me now when I said your brother was alive?" Shen Jiu says in a honeyed voice, holding Liu Qingge's arm. It is not a hug, but a protective gesture. Liu Qingge notices his tension and that he has narrowed his eyes despite his seemingly calm expression.

"Ge... Is that you? Is it really you?" Liu Mingyan babbles with tears shining in her eyes as she takes a step forward. "How...?" Her attention returns to Luo Binghe. Beneath her tears shines disappointment. "My lord, what are you doing with my brother?"

Luo Binghe doesn’t dare to say anything. Clever demon. Liu Mingyan hasn't figured out the fraud yet, but any mistake can put them in a bind. She is his sister and Liu Qingge wants to trust her just like Luo Binghe decided to trust her shijie. But he must carefully reveal the truth or Liu Mingyan will give them away by mistake.

"Liu Mingyan, listen to me..." He starts.

But then Shen Jiu grabs him by the lapels of his dress and kisses him. It is such an unexpected gesture that Liu Qingge opens his mouth in surprise, allowing Shen Jiu to deepen the kiss. Although that is something he has always wanted, he cannot understand his motives. Furthermore, it tastes like falsehood, deceit, and lies.

"What are you doing, Shen Qingqiu!?" Liu Mingyan growls, rushing towards them as fast as a breeze.

Perhaps she would have tried to stab him if Luo Binghe had not interceded, grabbing her wrist.

"Enough."

Shen Jiu separates from Liu Qingge without moving away from him. His arms encircle his neck with mock flirtatiousness.

"He is my price. My future husband has offered him to me as a wedding present." He purrs. "Now I have no reason to reject Luo Binghe..."

"Shen Jiu!" Liu Qingge warns him, confused but upset.

But before he can deny it, Shen Jiu kisses him again. This time, Liu Qingge puts his hands on his shoulders to pull him away, but Shen Jiu sinks his fingers into his hair. It is captivating to be swept away by him, but Liu Mingyan is his sister, his weakest point, and Liu Qingge considers it unfair to deceive her.

As they fight kissing, Liu Mingyan scolds Luo Binghe.

"You dare cheat on your first wife!?" She hisses. "Why!? Why have you brought my brother to sell him to Shen Qingqiu!?"

"This lord is not particularly pleased with shizun's affection for Liu-shishu." Luo Binghe acknowledges with a growl. His jealousy is sincere and adds a touch of authenticity to his words. "Of course, there are conditions. Shizun has promised me that he will do the same he does to Liu-shishu and twice with me… and this lord will taste Liu-shishu first."

Shen Jiu stops, choking, and Liu Qingge takes this opportunity to pull him away. Despite being able to speak, he is confused and speechless.

"You won't touch my brother!" Liu Mingyan roars. "I don't care that you are my husband. You have all the women you want. I have never controlled you or forced you to follow any limits, even when you took a fancy to that scum..."

She is his sister, she has the same face and the same sword, but her words are dark and twisted, making Liu Qingge feel uncomfortable. There is something terrible inside her. He can feel it.

"Don't call shizun that." Luo Binghe growls and his eyes narrow dangerously.

"Why not? Have you already forgotten what he did!? Our pain? He's a monster."

"And you not?" Luo Binghe leans towards her threateningly. "You said it yourself: you don't care what I do to shizun or any other of... my women. But you only react when it involves your brother. What a hypocrite."

The desire to protect his little sister beats in his heart, but Liu Qingge is paralyzed. He is startled when Shen Jiu places his hands on his cheeks and turns his head to look into his eyes.

"Sorry." He murmurs. "I wish you hadn't met her. This world is rotten."

This Liu Mingyan is rotten.

"Maybe I am, but I won't be the only hypocrite! How did you go from dismembering that bastard to wanting to take him to bed?"

Liu Qingge feels nauseated remembering the other Shen Qingqiu. And a certainty passes through him. He grabs Shen Jiu's wrists to pull him away and look at his sister.

"You knew it?" He sputters breathlessly. "Did you know what they did to him and you never stopped him?"

Liu Mingyan holds his gaze without a trace of regret.

"He deserved it."

And Liu Qingge understands why Shen Jiu has desperately tried to keep her from finding out the truth. It hurts to see her sister turned into that kind of person. She is a monster almost worse than Luo Binghe.

"Leave."

"What?" She babbles with wide eyes.

"I never want to see you again."

"But...Ge..." Her anger evaporates, replaced by confusion. "I can't leave you alone."

"You can just like you abandoned Shen Qingqiu."

"He killed you!"

"He wouldn’t do it!"

"Mingyan..." Ning Yingying's sweet voice chimes in. The young woman, who until then had stayed away from them, approaches her and puts her hands on her shoulders. "Come with me. I will talk to A-Luo. He will listen to me."

And with promises, she drags her towards the door. Liu Mingyan's resistance weakens as Ning Yingying manages to convince her.

The three of them breathe a sigh of relief when the door closes.

"Great job, Liu-shishu." Luo Binghe sneers sarcastically. "You almost screwed up."

Liu Qingge ignores him. He covers his face with one hand as he waits for his heart to settle. It still hurts. Seeing his sister has been something terrifying and that he won’t forget soon.

“I never imagined that she would become like this…”

"She is not the worst. In this world, everyone is rotten, broken, or dead." Shen Jiu comments harshly, but they recognize that his voice is weak and the sadness in his eyes. And no one dares to ask him what he has seen during his stay in this hell. "What about you, Luo Binghe? How did you know we couldn't trust her?"

The demon shrugs.

"I trusted shizun."

Although Shen Jiu is still angry with the demon, his response manages to soften his bad mood. He crosses his arms and twists his lips in a grimace, but Liu Qingge appreciates that Luo Binghe has broken through his armor. That's dangerous.

"We should go now." Liu Qingge says.

Luo Binghe nods. Despite the ordeal he had suffered until they found Shen Jiu, the demon is now unexpectedly assertive. He doesn't hesitate to draw his sword.

"Wait." Shen Jiu stops him with a raised hand. "We can't leave yet."

 

Cang Qiong Mountain Sect is in chaos when Shen Yuan returns with the rotting and dismembered body of the original Shen Qingqiu. Although Yue Qingyuan and Mu Qingfang's terror subsides when he explains that he is not Shen Jiu, his horror remains when they help carry him to Qian Cao Peak. The news soon spreads like wildfire and they must scare away all the curious. Although Shen Qingqiu seems to sleep in the prison, the change of world and the cultivators' yells are stressing him out. Shen Yuan notices it even though he insists on keeping his one eye tightly shut.

Shen Qingqiu probably thinks that he is trapped in a nightmare.

Once at Qian Cao Peak, Mu Qingfang takes Shen Qingqiu intending to wash him, disinfect his wounds and make a general assessment of his health. Yue Qingyuan offers to help him.

"No need, Zhangmen-shixiong." Mu Qingfang tells him. "My disciples are qualified."

"Although he is not our Shen Jiu, he is still a Peak Lord. He... deserves respect and intimacy. I will not leave him."

Something in Yue Qingyuan's words makes Shen Qingqiu's single eye tear up. Despite his weakness, he keeps hiding (or trying to) that weakness by keeping his eye closed. Like his brother. Because Shen Qingqiu and Shen Jiu are almost the same person. Shen Yuan's guts twist and nausea fills his throat as he gazes at him, too tiny and fragile in Mu Qingfang's arms.

His presence is unnecessary, so Shen Yuan flees. Not even the air sweetened by medicinal plants is enough to erase the memory of the prison of horrors. Breathing, Shen Yuan still smells the stench of blood and rotten meat in his lungs. Will he recover? Mu Qingfang has commented that they can use Shen Jiu's Sun and Moon Dew Flower seed, but planting a body will take at least several years.

The curiosity of the other Peak Lords draws them towards him, but Shen Yuan is unable to speak to anyone, not even Shang Qinghua. And the others slowly understand that he needs space and quiet. Shen Yuan is lost in his thoughts as lightning cuts through the air. And a portal appears out of nowhere. He gets up accompanied by a chorus of restless, distrustful, and nervous voices. Liu Qingge jumps out of the portal, relieving the tension crushing his heart. Liu Qingge's clothes are wrinkled and his hair is pulled back into a quick ponytail as if he had gotten into a fight with someone. To his relief, Shen Yuan doesn't recognize blood. Liu Qingge turns to help first Ning Yingying through the portal, then…

His brother.

Shen Yuan breaks into a run. Today he appreciates the speed of the cultivators more than ever because, by the time Shen Jiu hits the ground, he has already reached his side and hugs him tightly. Shen Jiu stumbles but manages to keep his balance.

"Jiu-Ge you're back!" He stammers, slurring the words from his throat instead of sobbing.

"What do you say, silly? You're the one who left, A-Yuan." There is no rancor in his voice, just immense relief. "Don't leave me again."

"Nevermore."

Shen Yuan buries his face into Shen Jiu as he hugs him tightly. He hears the voices of Liu Qingge and Luo Binghe, of everyone else, of a Ning Yingying who asks if it's okay for her to be there. Shen Yuan smiles before sighing. And his heart is light and happy, free from the panic of the last few days.

It’s over.

Chapter End Notes

In fact, this chapter could be called "siblings" by Liu Mingyan and Liu Qingge as well as the Shen brothers but... it's a reference of the title of the story :) And yes, Liu Qingge has changed his clothes before returning to his world.

EXTRA
Shen Yuan: Eeeh... Jiu-Ge.
Shen Jiu: Yes?
Shen Yuan: Why have you brought Ning Yingying?
Shen Jiu: I told you that you would have your own disciple.
Shen Yuan: You haven't kidnapped her, have you?
Shen Jiu: ...
Shen Yuan: YOU HAVEN'T KIDNAPPED HER, HAVE YOU?????

EXTRA 2
Shen Jiu: I don't understand.
Shen Jiu: You can bring the thing as a souvenir and I can't bring Ning Yingying?
Shen Yuan: DON'T CALL YOURSELF A THING.

I'm so excited because the fourth part will be the last one. And in the next chapter we will know more about Shen Qingqiu's healing and there will be a scene between him and Shen Jiu 🥺
